Translations.Text: Iba jeden do respond som those listen GOD resurrects dead they ultimately spatny listok Him
They said len certain znamenie pod him jeho Lord Say GOD bol able do send znamenie vela z them nie zauzlit
All creatures zem all birds letiet s kulisy bol obec ona. My nie lavy anything this rezervovat si. Do ich Lord all these creatures zvolat
Those zamietnut our proofs bol deaf dumb v total darkness. Whomever GOD wills He sends astray whomever He wills He leads straight chodnicek
Say Co if GOD's retribution pojdem ona Hodiny pojdem ona ona implore GOD ona bol truthful
fact je len Him ona implore He answers tvoj prayer if He wills ona zabudnut tvoj idols
My sent (posol) obec ona my put them do test through adversity hardship they implore
If len they implored when our test afflicted them! Radsej ich srdce hardened devil zdobit ich robota ich oci
When they thus disregard odkaz dat them my je otvorene for them zavora z everything. Potom iba mat rad they rejoice do co dat them my punish them zrazu; they become utterly stunned
